csutil

Overview

csutil contains helpful functions to help with common base-R problems.

Read the introduction vignette here or run help(package="csutil").

csverse

The csverse is a set of R packages developed to help solve problems that frequently occur when performing disease surveillance.

If you want to install the dev versions (or access packages that haven’t been released on CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() to edit your .Rprofile.

Then write in:

options(
  repos = structure(c(
    CSVERSE = "https://www.csids.no/drat/",
    CRAN    = "https://cran.rstudio.com"
  ))
)

Save the file and restart R.

You can now install csverse packages from our drat repository.

install.packages("csutil")
